sentences.en: As our insensitivity has increased, so naturally has our ability to discern that insensitivity declined.
sentences.cn: 因为我们的迟钝在增长 —— 自然地我们觉察得出这种迟钝的能力在衰落.

sentences.en: Before judging reporters for their insensitivity, keep in mind that our job is to get stories into the media and ensure a last impression.
sentences.cn: 在评价那些记者们的不敏感性之前，我们必须记住我们的工作是为媒体获取故事以保证一个最终的印象。

sentences.en: But its insensitivity means the shift is almost too small to measure and complicated to calculate.
sentences.cn: 但它的不敏感性意味着偏移小到几乎无法测量和计算复杂到无法计算。

sentences.en: Half the letters were scathing indictments of his insensitivity and lack of understanding.
sentences.cn: 有的信慷慨陈词,骂他缺乏同情心,毫无谅解精神.

sentences.en: I was ashamed at my clumsiness and insensitivity.
sentences.cn: 我为自己的笨拙和麻木不仁感到羞愧。

sentences.en: It is relative insensitivity to other than red and infrared lights.
sentences.cn: 它对红光,红外线的光以外的其它光相对来说是不敏感的.

sentences.en: My childhood was difficult, marked by constant surgeries and by the insensitivity of other kids.
sentences.cn: 我的童年很艰难, 手术不断,还遭到其他孩子的冷落.

sentences.en: Then I would be met by lots of comments about my chauvinism and insensitivity.
sentences.cn: 然后我就会面对一对关于我沙文主义以及迟钝的批评.

sentences.en: You think that God will smite him because of our insensitivity?
sentences.cn: 你认为我们的敏感会使上帝打击他?

words.tran_cn: 无感觉的；无情的；无生命的
昏迷的；无知觉的；麻木不仁的
感觉迟钝的，对…没有感觉的
感觉迟钝；[仪]不灵敏性；昏迷

trans.tran_cn: 不灵敏，不灵敏度，不敏感，不敏感性
